abstract.original_text: PERSPECTIVES timely assessment of phage biology and its bright future. Here, I summarize the studies of the molecular, ecological and evolutionary biology of phages that have led to this renaissance of interest, and define some crucial unanswered questions.

sentences.segment_text: PERSPECTIVES timely assessment of phage biology and its bright future .
Here , I summarize the studies of the molecular ,
ecological and evolutionary biology of phages that have led to this renaissance of interest ,
and define some crucial unanswered questions .
